mapper.select: select bom_code, bom_level, ing_code, item_name, a.item_con, a.unit, b.item_type, c.pro_code, c.pro_name,a.level_type,a.pro_order from bom a join itemList b on (a.ing_code = b.item_code) left outer join process c on(a.pro_code = c.pro_code) where a.item_code = #{itemCode} start with level_type is not null connect by bom_level = prior leveL_type order siblings by level_type
